# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet the highest standards. With its unique features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its quality and functionality, I believe this product is worth more than its face value. Considering all its benefits, I am offering it to you for $120. This is a special opportunity to own a top-tier item at an exclusive price. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
